original_text: The whole land will become spoiled with salt and sulphur. No one will plant seed in it, because nothing will grow there. Even grass will not grow on it. The land will be useless, like the cities that the Lord destroyed when he was very angry with them. Those cities were Sodom and Gomorrah, Admah and Zeboiim.
korean_text: 그 온 땅이 유황이 되며 소금이 되며 또 불에 타서 심지도 못하며 결실함도 없으며 거기에는 아무 풀도 나지 아니함이 옛적에 여호와께서 진노와 격분으로 멸하신 소돔과 고모라와 아드마와 스보임의 무너짐과 같음을 보고 물을 것이요

sentences.original_text: The whole land will become spoiled with salt
sentences.korean_translation: 온 땅은 소금으로 인해 망가질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: No one will plant seed in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 아무도 씨를 심지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Even grass will not grow on it
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 풀조차도 그곳에서 자라지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: like the cities that the Lord destroyed
when he was very angry with them
Those cities were Sodom and Gomorrah
